definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
same as 烏魯克恰提|乌鲁克恰提 in Xinjiang

sentences.english: The Wuqia earthquake occurred only 25 days after the Hindu Kush earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 烏恰地震發生在興都庫什地震之後僅僅25天。

sentences.english: Themajority of the houses in Wuqia county town and Wupaer town collapsed and were destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 烏恰縣城和烏帕爾鎮大多數房屋倒塌或遭到破壞。

sentences.english: This is a copper-zinc deposit in Uchaly.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個在烏恰雷的銅鋅礦。
